title: SQS to Lambda
description: Create a Lambda function to parse message received by an SQS queue.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use a Lambda function to parse messages when they are received by an SQS queue.
This pattern creates the following resources: SQS queue, Lambda function, CloudWatch Log group, IAM role and IAM policy with least privileges.
The Lambda function uses lambda-powertools-python layer for best logging practices.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
